data.text: Ndiela kuzitisa, a Yave, mu ntimꞌama wumvimba.
Ndiela mona khini ayi ndiela sakadala mu ngeyo,
Bambeni ziama balembo vutukisa ku manima,
Bila ngeyo wunzengidi nkanu mu busonga, wudedisidi mambu mama ;
Ngeyo wutemina makanda,
Mbivusu yikambulu tsukulu yibuididi bambeni ;
Yave wunyalanga mu zithangu zioso ;
Wela sambisa nza mu busonga,
Yave niandi suamunu ki mutu weti yamusu ;
Babo bazebi dizina diaku,
Luyimbidila Yave minzitusu mutu wowo wukala ku Sioni ;
Bila mutu wowo wumvutulanga landi mu diambu di menga matengolo
A Yave, tala buevi bambeni ziama
Muingi ndiyamikisa minzitusu miaku
Makanda mabuidi mu dibulu dinneni diodi bakaba ;
Yave wukimonikisidi, mu busonga buandi ;
Batu bambimbi balembo vutuki ku tsi bafua,
Vayi nsukami kalendi tumbu zimbukunu ko
A Yave, telama !
A Yave, wubabuisila tsisi !
